title: NEW RANKING SYSTEM, MOST IMPORTANT CHANGE TO LOL EVER
body:
A WIN lose system if such a stone age way of looking at things, the world is not flat... its round and can be looked at by many angles.

My Rank should be based on my ability FULL STOP!
ESPECIALLY IN Solo Que your rank should be based on YOUR ABILITY and PERFORMANCE, Not others
Its so easily done!!!!
measure us on

KDR per game
Leaver%
Assist average per game
Gold average per game
Wards PLACED average per game
Ward placed detecting enemy players average per game
Wards Destroyed average per game
Minions Killed average Per game
Neutral Creeps killed per game
DAMAGE to Minions average per game
Damage to Champions average per game
Dragon Kills average per game
Damage to dragon average per game
Barron kills average per game
Damage to Barron average per game
TOWERS destroyed average per game
Damage to towers average per game
Inhibitors Destroyed average per game
Damage RECEIVED from towers average per game
Damage RECEIVED form Champions average per game
Damage received from Neutral Minions average per game
Damage received from Minions average per game
First hit initiation leading to kill average per game
Healing players average per game
Healing received average per game

I could keep going but i think you get the point. Then all you do is add'em up and you come up with a your rank.
Obviously things like assists and KDR will have a heavier weigh in.
But a well placed ward can WIN a game, why not receive credit for it?
A WIN lose system if such a stone age way of looking at things, the world is not flat... its round and can be looked at by many angles.

P.s
Let's get one thing straight first. I've been playing these games allot longer than you ya little punk! I don't care what smart ass troll comment you put on here because you know what kid. I KNOW I'M RIGHT ABOUT THIS. So troll me all you F##king want your opinion mean sweet f##k all.
I'm a fat old f##k who has wasted his life playing VIDEO GAMES and has gotten no where doing it? What else ya got?

I have been playing these games since Dota.v.1 On War Craft Frozen Throne.
Ive played HON
Ive played Dota 2
Ive been here in LOL since season 1 playing on NA Servers
I have more experience and knowledge of this game than 99% of the people who play it.
BUT
you wanna know where i am. Bronze 5. I just fell form Silver 2 to Bronze 5 in a matter of days due to one reason. Leavers.
You think i'm joking when i say i get MORE GAMES with leavers than without in ranked? Well i'm not. making the ranked system a f##king joke to me
I will be leaving this game forever soon (thank god) as i have found my new addiction but b4 i go i just wanted to say.
I HATE! your ranked system. AND I ####### HATE THE OCE COMMUNITY

A system that does not rate you on YOUR own performance but binds you to others is not only unfair its a F##KING joke!

For example, you have just come from the loading screen, the champions appear and then some Mother ####### ##### of #### moves two steps on the summoner platform. types /L and then leaves the GAME.
In your ranked system i NOW find myself not only in a situation i have or had no control over, but now i am some how responsible for it, and now i have to suffer the consequences of this ####### ##### leaving.
I and the other 3 people lose the GAME, lose LP, and i get demoted.

What PART of that is fair at ####### all! answer, is nothing about that is fair, if you can find justification in that you a f##king Pr##k

My simple question is: how will you rank people using those information, give examples?

How a player who placed 40 wards per game better then a player who has 15 K/Dr? How a player who has destroyed 10 towers per game better then a player who has done more damage to champions?

It'd need a really intricate and specific math.

People could just spam wards all game and get better rank with someone who doesn't.
OP did mention "Wards placed detecting enemy players..." though.

You seem to be implying that his system would randomly pick the best stat and compare with someone else's best (completely different) stat.

OP means to say that taking into account almost all of the statistics you are presented with, at the post-game lobby, would provide a far better picture of a player's skill than just a win/lose, with a few bits of over stats attached. 

Note: I don't know all the factors that the ranking machine takes into account at its current state.

Instead of a "one LINE" ranking system.... why not many?

Best Support, Best Adc, Best Fighter, Best Mage, Best TANK, etc etc.

If you can pick your role in "team builder" why not be able to SELECT a role as you pick in SoloQ Ranked Champion selection.

For example .... I'm first pick, I pick Garren.... I select "Top" & "Fighter" as my role.
That way i'm locked into a Ranking System but even better!!!... My team now KNOW.
That i plan to go Top and that my play STYLE is "Off Tank Damage" not just "Straight Tank"
or I Pick Leona, Select "Bottom" And "Support Tank"
or I pick Ash, Select "Bottom" and "ADC"

New game, Champion SELECTION... Some one says "Ranked 4th ADC" ... You check.... They are.... "Let "######" adc i just checked hes good"... People let him adc, and NOWyou have a strong adc.

I mean of course champ selection rule would still be in effect and you might not always want to jungle but at least this way you have a fighting CHANCE at a team with strengths? instead of an entire team that wants to ADC or MID?
